mapper.sql: u.INT_ID, u.BTS_TYPE, u.COST_TYPE, u.CONTRACT_STARTTIME, u.CONTRACT_ENDTIME, u.PAY_CYCLE, u.PAY_DAY, u.AHEAD_DAY, u.REMIND_USER, u.REMIND_TEL, u.MONEY, u.CONTRACT_FILE, u.REMARK, u.EACH_TEL, u.EACH_ACCOUNTNAME, u.EACH_BANKNUM, u.PAY_TYPE, u.BANK_ACCOUNT, u.BALANCE,u.IN_TIME,u.IN_USER
mapper.select: select ,c.name cityName,d.name countryName,b.name btsName,b.bsc_name bscName, b.bts_id btsId from WY_BTS_CHARGE u left join wy_bts b on u.INT_ID=b.INT_ID left join wy_city c on c.id=b.city_id left join wy_city d on d.id=b.county_id where u.INT_ID = #{intId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and u.COST_TYPE=#{costType}

select ,c.name cityName,d.name countryName,b.name btsName,b.bsc_name bscName, b.bts_id btsId from WY_BTS_CHARGE u left join wy_bbu b on u.INT_ID=b.INT_ID left join wy_city c on c.id=b.city_id left join wy_city d on d.id=b.county_id where u.INT_ID = #{intId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and u.COST_TYPE=#{costType}

select ,c.name cityName,d.name countryName,b.name btsName,b.bsc_name bscName, b.bts_id btsId from WY_BTS_CHARGE u left join wy_tunel b on u.INT_ID=b.INT_ID left join wy_city c on c.id=b.city_id left join wy_city d on d.id=b.county_id where u.INT_ID = #{intId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and u.COST_TYPE=#{costType}
mapper.insert: insert into WY_BTS_CHARGE (INT_ID, BTS_TYPE, COST_TYPE, CONTRACT_STARTTIME, CONTRACT_ENDTIME, PAY_CYCLE, PAY_DAY, AHEAD_DAY, REMIND_USER, REMIND_TEL, MONEY, CONTRACT_FILE, REMARK, EACH_TEL, EACH_ACCOUNTNAME, EACH_BANKNUM, PAY_TYPE, BANK_ACCOUNT, BALANCE,IN_TIME,IN_USER) values (#{intId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{btsType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{costType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{contractStarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{contractEndtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{payCycle,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payDay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{aheadDay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remindUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remindTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{contractFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eachTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eachAccountname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eachBanknum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{inTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{inUser,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update:
update WY_BTS_CHARGE
BTS_TYPE = #{btsType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COST_TYPE = #{costType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CONTRACT_STARTTIME = #{contractStarttime,jdbcType=DATE},
CONTRACT_ENDTIME = #{contractEndtime,jdbcType=DATE},
PAY_CYCLE = #{payCycle,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAY_DAY = #{payDay,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AHEAD_DAY = #{aheadDay,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMIND_USER = #{remindUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMIND_TEL = #{remindTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MONEY = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CONTRACT_FILE = #{contractFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EACH_TEL = #{eachTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EACH_ACCOUNTNAME = #{eachAccountname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EACH_BANKNUM = #{eachBanknum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_TYPE = #{payType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BANK_ACCOUNT = #{bankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BALANCE = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IN_TIME=#{inTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
IN_USER=#{inUser,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
where INT_ID = #{intId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
